title: Online Scenario-Based Parenting Skills Training Program for Parents of Oppositional Adolescents

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Blended program combining real-time video classes and asynchronous scenario-based learning in a BYOD environment, operating during evening hours for working parents

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application of three or more positive discipline techniques to real-world case scenarios.
Learners develop strategies to reduce conflict situations by over 70% using anger management and communication skills.
Learners quantitatively evaluate changes in their parenting capabilities using a self-efficacy measurement tool.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
